title: Huebener and Other Plays
description: Preface, Huebner, Fire in the Bones, Gentle Barbarian, Frere Lawrence, and Charades. "Huebner touched us where no other Mormon play had ever reached.... Huebner did what art is meant to it changed our life.... We know more than a few artists who could die happy if they knew they had done that even once." -- Orson Scott Card
author: Thomas F. Rogers
